# Houdini Unreal Installation

1. Download the Houdini Engine for Unreal plugin from GitHub
2. Copy the `HoudiniEngine` folder to `~/Projects/Unreal Projects/<project-name>/Plugins/Runtime/` (create `Plugins/Runtime/` if it's missing)

## Verify Installation

After installing, there will be a `Houdini Engine` menu item (to the right of `Edit`).
